item.title: Walmart reportedly cutting jobs as it refocuses on Bentonville headquarters
item.description: Some employees being asked to relocate as U.S.’s largest private employer builds up hubs in Arkansas and California

item.title: Oil prices drop on rising U.S. inventories and fears tariffs will dent Chinese demand
item.description: Oil futures fell Wednesday, feeling pressure after industry data showed a large rise in U.S. crude inventories and as investors feared a U.S. -China t...

item.title: Tesla sales are diving in Germany and across Europe too
item.description: Tesla sales have careened lower in Germany in January, as sales of the electric vehicle company headed by Elon Musk tumble across Europe.

item.title: Pay attention to what junk bonds are saying about the value of Treasury bonds
item.description: High-yield bond holders aren’t asking for much of a premium above ultra-safe U.S. Treasurys. Time to own quality.

item.title: Uber’s stock falls in the face of its ‘strongest quarter ever.’ Here’s why.
item.description: The ride-hailing company faces stiff pressure from the strong U.S. dollar, which is weighing on its forecast for the current quarter.
